com.jayway.restassured.specification

Interface FilterableRequestSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RequestSender, RequestSenderOptions<Response>, RequestSpecification
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestSpecificationImpl

    public interface FilterableRequestSpecification
extends RequestSpecification
    A request specification that also supports getting the defined values. Intended for Filters.

      • getHttpClient

        org.apache.http.client.HttpClient getHttpClient()
        Returns:
        The underlying http client. Only use this for advanced configuration which is not accessible from Rest Assured! By default an instance of AbstractHttpClient is used by REST Assured.
